name: Gravity Golf (Wild Goat Games)
description:
Gravity GolfWeekly Game Jam #211 - Gravity

Master physics-bending gravity wells to guide your shot through a perilous course and land yourself a hole in one! Warning: Not for the faint of heart.

Your goal:

  • Reach the hole at the end of the course to win the game.
  • Avoid hitting black obstacles.

How to play:

  1. Drag and drop Gravity Wells onto course from the Inventory on the left-hand side of the screen. Click and drag Gravity Wells to further reposition them on the course.
  2. Move the mouse to the left or right side of the screen to pan the camera.
  3. Hit the Spacebar when you're ready to take your shot.
  4. Use the Mouse to aim your shot and hold down the Left Mouse Button to power your shot and release.
  5. If you are unsuccessful, hit the R Key on your keyboard to reset your shot and revert back to the setup phase.

This game was created for the Weekly Game Jam #211 game jam.

Good luck!
